attributes.action: Allow serving Military Personnel to suspend services during overseas deployments
attributes.additional_details: Last year I was deployed overseas for 4 mths. I had to cancel both my Sky & PlusNet services which totalled approx. £80 per mth because neither would suspend the service to be restarted on my return. There were no issues restarting Sky but with PlusNet I have had to pay £45 to install a new line and wait over 5 weeks for the service to reinstated. Potentially this could occur every 1-3 yrs dependent on turn around of deployments
attributes.background: Some companies do not allow Serving Military personnel to suspend contracts when deployed overseas for periods of 3-8 months when they are not able to use those services during the deployment. Contracts have to be cancelled and restarted with additional costs involved.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the service providers and not the UK Government or Parliament.
